mapper.update: update gd_anli set company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sysName = #{sysname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, company, createTime, deleted, detail, industry, logo, orderNo, sysName, `type` from gd_anli where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, company, createTime, deleted, detail, industry, logo, orderNo, sysName, `type` from gd_anli
